title: 新手宝宝应该注意些啥
author: 阿凡达1414

replies.author: 人称老秀
replies.txt_content: 版规 还有千万不要发水帖

replies.txt_content: 版规很重要，水贴会被罚

replies.txt_content: 多看版规少吃亏呐  这个论坛的管理只要能抓到机会  就会疯狂惩戒你  前两天  竟然还有个管理说要把我头按在键盘上  我给他十个胆子sdjfhasjfbashftsgdayudkfasjfhaskjlfnasjbhxczgpaieasjfbashftsgdayudkfasjfhaskjlfnasjbhxczgpaieasjfbashftsgdayudkfasjfhaskjlfnasjbhxczgpaieasjfbashftsgdayudkfasjfhaskjlfnasjbhxczgpaie
